revised_title: A Case Study of Iliac Passion and Palsy of the Large Intestines
tldr: This article presents a case study of a patient suffering from an iliac passion and palsy of the large intestines. Despite various treatments, the patient eventually succumbed to the illness. Upon autopsy, the colon and caecum were found to be severely inflamed and distended with gas, while the quicksilver administered as a treatment was dispersed throughout the abdominal cavity.
